__e: I want to see who did this behind bars for a very long time.
My problem is that your ass should still be in jail for all the damage you've done to my family.
Or maybe I should ask your police chief what he thinks about his newest detective dating a woman who should be behind bars for fraud, among other things.
I mean, does he, like, reach his hand through the bars... and have dinner with everyone around the table?
For once, I wanted to see you behind bars... and now I have.
See, here's the amazing thing about you being the convict and me being the non-convict...
And before I know it, I'm behind bars again.
I'll give you enough to put this bastard away forever.
